# INSiriAuthorizationStatus.denied

**Case**

Not authorized. The user explicitly denied authorization for this app.

## Declaration

```swift
case denied
```

## Constants

- **INSiriAuthorizationStatus.notDetermined**: Not yet determined. An authorization request has not yet been made or the user has not yet made a choice regarding the status of the app. Call the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPreferences/requestSiriAuthorization(_:)] method to request authorization from the user.
- **INSiriAuthorizationStatus.restricted**: Restricted. The app is not authorized to use Siri services. This status could be the result of active restrictions on Siri services rather than on the user denying access.
- **INSiriAuthorizationStatus.authorized**: Authorized. Siri is enabled and your app is authorized to interact with it.
